snippet.title: The Sly Collection™ Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Sly and the gang return in three stories of action, stealth and adventure all on one Blu-Ray Disc™! Check out their high definition antics in this latest  trailer for The Sly Collection™

©2010 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.  The Sly Collection, Sly Cooper, Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus, Sly 2: Band of Thieves and Sly 3 Honor Among Thieves are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
